thread.title: Charming hotel, Lovely stay
thread.title_full: Charming hotel, Lovely stay - Review of Ashburn Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RoniWV
title: Charming hotel, Lovely stay
text: We decided to take a couple days to ourselves before meeting the rest of the family in Florence for the holidays. Hotel was charming, our room was spacious. I loved the heated bathroom floor, especially right out of the tub! The bed was comfortable and we fell right asleep after a long day of sightseeing. Breakfast was convenient and offered cereals, pastries, meats and hard boiled eggs. Front desk staff very helpful and assisted us in navigating the "Tube." Any request was met promptly and with a smile. overall, we were very satisfied!
